document.full_text: online coupon service groupon has hired a google executive to be its new chief operating officer, as google began rolling out a new service aimed directly at groupon's thriving business.
document.title: google loses executive to groupon, preps rival service
lines_and_colors: online coupon service groupon has hired a google executive to be its new chief operating officer, as google began rolling out a new service aimed directly at groupon's thriving business.
